comments.body:
Solution i found was to copy the `ref` directory from the powershell installation, to the path that does not exist. 

`C:\Program Files\PowerShell\6\ref`

There should be a better solution i guess.

Edit: This is still an issue in `Microsoft.PowerShell.SDK 7.0.0-preview.1`
Edit: This doesn't help either: https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/tree/master/docs/host-powershell#special-hosting-scenario-for-native-host
